title: Is global business management from Conestoga College a good option? - Quora

response.answer_text: To be very honest, there is no point of pursuing a business management program just for the sake of it. Contestoga College has no credibility when it comes to the domain. If you want to pursue business management in Canada you should only be looking a the leading schools for the same: University of TorontoUniversity of British ColumbiaMcGill UniversityYork
